body:
I like how it has Yuri in These Princess connect Hentai and 98% the time  kokoro is there and never participates in the Yuri while the other girls do. It like most the artist think the same. Formula is other 2 girls do Yuri action kokoro just in the same page. The same thing is done with Sayaka itomi as well when their is a lot of Yuri there they hardly ever participate...

Also any one reading this comment, may you receive good health and fortune if you have good intent.
